医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
绿色空间的不平等与城市地区可预防的死亡有关调查结果显示，贫困社区中更多的绿色空间与较低的死亡率相关，因此提倡采取战略性公共卫生举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Inequalities-in-green-space-linked-to-preventable-deaths-in-urban-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Inequalities-in-green-space-linked-to-preventable-deaths-in-urban-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d473d8b-0500-486d-8316-d6cf619b7c72 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 04:55:00 -0500 Inequalities in green space linked to preventable deaths in urban areas
研究人员发现影响视网膜细胞剪接过程的机制基因包含生命的基本构建指令，指导细胞以何种顺序组装哪些氨基酸以产生特定的蛋白质。人类基因组编码了大约 20,000 个这样的指令。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-mechanism-affecting-splicing-process-in-retinal-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-mechanism-affecting-splicing-process-in-retinal-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=945f841f-ec5d-4332-9662-5de8582a92cd Fri, 15 Nov 2024 01:57:00 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism affecting splicing process in retinal cells
NIH 拨款 396 万美元用于开发超级细菌联合疗法据美国国立卫生研究院称，革兰氏阴性细菌对全球健康构成严重威胁，因为它们可以抵抗多种抗生素，使感染难以治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/NIH-awards-24396-million-to-develop-combination-therapies-for-superbugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/NIH-awards-24396-million-to-develop-combination-therapies-for-superbugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b93670f-d648-4688-8e5e-aaeec0016992 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 01:42:09 -0500 NIH awards $3.96 million to develop combination therapies for superbugs
阿贡国家实验室获得 2170 万美元资金用于推进癌症和疫苗的发现美国能源部 (DOE) 阿贡国家实验室将利用其世界领先的人工智能 (AI) 和高性能计算能力来研究抗癌和变革疫苗发现的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Argonne-receives-24217-million-to-advance-cancer-and-vaccine-discoveries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Argonne-receives-24217-million-to-advance-cancer-and-vaccine-discoveries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1215628-1175-46fd-9c3a-becc0dbdf028 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 01:23:47 -0500 Argonne receives $21.7 million to advance cancer and vaccine discoveries
流行病导致出生时患有心脏缺陷的婴儿增加 16%根据伦敦大学圣乔治市医院今天发表在妇产科超声杂志上的研究，在大流行的第一年之后，出生时患有先天性心脏异常的婴儿比例增加了 16%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pandemic-linked-to-1625-rise-in-babies-born-with-heart-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pandemic-linked-to-1625-rise-in-babies-born-with-heart-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22abcef-a331-45dd-a229-77d93988ba61 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 01:02:00 -0500 Pandemic linked to 16% rise in babies born with heart defects
人工智能工具通过活检图像预测癌细胞中的基因活性为了确定癌症的类型和严重程度，病理学家通常在显微镜下分析肿瘤活检的薄片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/AI-powered-tool-predicts-gene-activity-in-cancer-cells-from-biopsy-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/AI-powered-tool-predicts-gene-activity-in-cancer-cells-from-biopsy-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b648a06f-a2e2-4c79-bce9-81ce50ae8489 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 23:01:46 -0500 AI-powered tool predicts gene activity in cancer cells from biopsy images
研究人员利用脑脊液解开阿尔茨海默病的通路许多基因与阿尔茨海默病的发展有关。具体来说，这些基因如何影响神经退行性疾病的进展仍然是一个黑匣子，部分原因是在分子细节上检查活体患者大脑的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-use-cerebrospinal-fluid-to-unlock-pathways-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-use-cerebrospinal-fluid-to-unlock-pathways-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b00650f0-2684-4893-9984-5b38ec5defc2 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:57:50 -0500 Researchers use cerebrospinal fluid to unlock pathways in Alzheimer's disease
女性消防员因接触有毒物质而面临较高的乳腺癌风险有充分证据表明，消防员的癌症发病率明显高于普通人群，而这些升高的发病率与工作中接触有毒化学物质有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Female-firefighters-face-elevated-breast-cancer-risks-due-to-有毒-exposures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Female-firefighters-face-elevated-breast-cancer-risks-due-to-有毒-exposures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092ce2c0-7e36-4c8b-a724-562feb803d83 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:34:28 -0500 Female firefighters face elevated breast cancer risks due to toxic exposures
未来人工智能驱动的虚拟实验室设计出有效的 SARS-CoV-2 纳米抗体人工智能与人类在“虚拟实验室”中的合作成功设计并通过实验验证了与 SARS-CoV-2 变体结合增强的纳米抗体，为跨学科研究提供了一种新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Futuristic-AI-powered-virtual-lab-designs-potted-SARS-CoV-2-nanobodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Futuristic-AI-powered-virtual-lab-designs-pot-SARS-CoV-2-nanobodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25258806-eff5-48eb-b8db-b6b0f1003b6b Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:34:00 -0500 Futuristic AI-powered virtual lab designs potent SARS-CoV-2 nanobodies
替泽帕肽显着降低肥胖和糖尿病前期患者的体重和糖尿病风险替泽帕肽在肥胖和糖尿病前期患者中显示出减肥和预防糖尿病进展的前景，具有持久的益处和可控制的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Tirzepatide-significantly-reduces-weight-and-diabetes-risk-in-病人-with-obesity-and-prediabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Tirzepatide-significantly-reduces-weight-and-diabetes-risk-in-病人-with-obesity-and-prediabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50ce60a2-03b4-46fc-a1b6-13afa54e7b4e Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:07:00 -0500 Tirzepatide significantly reduces weight and diabetes risk in patients with obesity and prediabetes
